description: Germany has revealed he was poisoned with Novichok. This is how events unfolded over Siberia.
title: Alexei Navalny: Two hours that saved Russian opposition leader's life
title_page: Alexei Navalny: Two hours that saved Russian opposition leader's life - BBC News
maintext: "We waited for another 10 minutes for the ambulance to arrive," he says. "During this time, the doctors took Navalny's blood pressure and gave him an intravenous drip - but I think it was clear to them that it was of no use."
